contact.intro: As good as it is to look through our website, we’d love to talk to you face to face about our work, what we do and how we might help.

form.intro: We’d like to hear from you!

intro.heading: Punch is a business partner for ambitious brands.

about.title: A holistic approach
about.text: It´s the sum of all interactions that constitute the experience of a brand. We therefore need to understand the entire brand ecosphere and anticipate future needs among the intended users, to be able to cater for seamless interactions across all touchpoints.

approach.intro: Our methodology derived from our broad experinces in creative industry. Based on that experience we defined
approach.exitline: WE WOULD BE HAPPY TO GIVE YOU MORE  INSIGHTS ABOUT OUR WORK PROCESS

columns.markdown:
### Comments and conclusions
During the campaign we have worked on daily CPC decrease to get as many clicks as possible for available budget. As the result of campaign optimisation we have recorded CPC drop of almost x10 times or 9.875% during the 10 days period.  Presented graph is showing daily average CPC for Swedish market for all campaigns in total. Since daily average CPC dropped we were able to boost campaign performance with similar daily budget.
### CPC optimisation
Average cost per click decrease was achieved through series of campaign optimisations.  Most effective step was bid adjustment per device.
* # 4.44
 Highest CPC per campaign

 ~ price in EUR
* # 0.04
 Lowest CPC per campaign

 ~ price in EUR
